Review Comment: I bought this phone for gaming purposes and it does not run smoothly at all, it is laggy and glitchy. When I ran tiktok, it crashed. While playing mobile legends the controls were delayed and graphics had to be lowered. Although I lowered the graphics, the performance was still as bad. I do not recommend for those who are buying for gaming, look for better alternatives. As for everyday use, it’s okay.
